title: queryFilter
name: queryFilter
description: This function creates a new Query that returns all rows from an query that match the given filter.

arguments.name: filter
arguments.description: filter can be a function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(struct row[, number rowNumber, query query]):boolean].

arguments.name: maxThreads
arguments.description: maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument "parallel" is set to false
